p:
Other differences between these datasets include different methods for assembling data; ref.
2 aggregated each data in 1° grids cell while ref.
1 aggregated at erratic points covering a 50 km radius. In addition, each point data in Fig. 2 from refs
1, 2 have slightly different TEC coverages in ref.
1 . Furthermore, TECs were derived only from autumn ICESat campaigns in ref.
2 but from both autumn and winter campaigns in ref.
1 .
